column5: The people on this board never cease to amaze me. I recently sold my AquaVu to Wayne. He made me an offer that I accepted, the deal was that I would pay the freight. The cheque arrived today and he had added in the cost of the freight, his reasoning: I'd be ripping you off if I didn't cover the freight! Now that is a class act!!!!! Most other people would have just smiled as they put the extra money in their pocket.  A true gentleman as always Wayne! Thank you!
Surprises me none Cliff, but then again I know him personally.

Dang Cliff.. you're embarrassing me! Now tell them the whole story... How about someone shipping you something and saying mail me a cheque if you like it??? The thing is mint.. 1/2 the DISCOUNTED retail price... has never seen the ice.. no wear and tear.. only used as a bedroom security camera... How could I not pay for the postage!!!
I hear he is gay and just making his move on you.  Sorry Wayne, I just needed another reason to use one of my special emoticons.
Hey Dave... wanna go to Temagami with me next week.. I'll go up.. you come down!!
:jerry:
So who'll be the husband & who'll be the wife??????????????
some how nicely dressed guys are coming to mind  lets see your weed eater  oh cool on the camrea
Ahhh, baseball season.  Pitchers and catchers report early.
LOL Connie!!  Thanks for the post Cliff.. too bad about that lad up there in the dark 20 hours a day ! Darkness does funny things to people and why my brother hated going in to Alert with the Herc !
yep...not enough daylight hours to go out and play with his friends ...so instead ...stays in ...and plays with himself...
Then you are both lucky people! Born from the same cloth!
good to hear guys. and some damn funny comments too. where are you all going fishing?  brokeback lake?
I ain't never broke nobodys back I don't care what Beans told you! That old fart exagerates!
it wasn't when you all were in prison was it?
...dang,...spilt drink and need to clean off the monitor now, note to self, do not read this thread while drinking water...LOL
A whole bunch of very disturbing images have popped into my very disturbed mind.....    Pass the sedatives please
Ha! Twin jets on the keyboard.
I am shocked....
no matter what happens...no strawberry sunday's...
LLOYD - look what you've done .... Wayne will never be the same...
Not a chance with my hemmeroids...besides if you met the great women we married there would be no doubt we were heterosexuals...
Hey you old fart...who you calling an old fart ???  Did you get your senior citizen card from Ottawa yet ?  Nice of them to let us know we are getting old...
